items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan shavings.
